melting
Class ThermoResult

java.lang.Object
  melting.Thermodynamics
      melting.ThermoResult

public class ThermoResult
extends Thermodynamics

This class extends Thermodynamics. It represents the computed thermodynamic results of Melting It contains a Tm double and a salIndependentEntropy double value as instance variables in addition to the instance variables of the Thermodynamics class.
